title: Fundamental Data Analysis using Power BI
headline: This free online course will explore MS Power BI's various tools and functions used for extensive data analysis.
description: Data analysts are one of the most sought-after professionals in this era. Many organizations want to make sense of big data for decision-making. Microsoft Power BI is a popular data analysis and visualization program. However, integrating it with a set of services, apps and connectors demands certain skills. This course gets you started with this powerful toolset, training you perfectly in Power BI data analysis techniques.

courseDescription:
The first choice for a data analyst tool for business owners, data analysts and finance professionals is Microsoft Power BI - a simple data modeling, visualization and analysis tool. One of the most in-demand skills is its ability to convert data from different data sources to interactive dashboards and BI reports. Power BI is simple and can connect to a Microsoft Excel workbook or a local database. It is also able to achieve enterprise-grade and ready-for-real-time analytics. This means you can use it in various environments, from a personal report and visualization tool to the analytics and decision engine behind group projects, division or entire corporations. This course, ‘Fundamental Data Analysis using Power BI’, is perfectly designed for a beginner who wants to be a Power BI expert but lacks the essential knowledge and skills to start. It fills that gap and is precisely created to help you start a career journey in Power BI.

This course consists of instructor-led videos that ensure you get hands-on experience using real-time projects. Divided into different modules and topics, it offers theoretical knowledge with a practical understanding of various concepts. You will discover how to gain insights from your data using Power BI functions as you create and share impactful visualizations with others in your organization. The course begins with the Power BI Desktop version, explaining how to import data, create visualizations, arrange those visualizations into reports and then effectively create and share impactful visualizations with others in your organization. The emphasis aims to help you acquire a practical understanding of the tool and develop your skills in Power BI.

Power BI proficiency is one of the world's most in-demand skills. The good news is there is no prior technical knowledge required for this Power BI course. So if you are a beginner who wants to make a career in data analytics, this course is a perfect opportunity. It is also suited for data analysts, finance professionals or business executives who want to refresh their skills. So what are you waiting for? Join the course now and be an analytic data expert by mastering this powerful data analysis application.

Start Course Now

All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module gets you started with this powerful data tool called Power BI. Covering the BI Desktop version, the module will help you understand Power Bi tools, functions, and elements with their application. The lessons further guide you in importing, modeling, and visualizing data in Power BI.

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Structure in Data Analysis and Other Measures
modules.description: This module provides a deep understanding of using and creating tables in data analysis with their types and functions. The topics also cover measures in more detail, their types, functions, and usage. You will also learn about generating dashboards and the procedure to publish and share the report.
topics: Structure in Data Analysis and Other Measures - Learning Outcomes
Measuring Explicit and Creating Data Table
More Measure, Data Visualisation and Sharing
